title: # 286 - Dan Cummins & ME
description:
I hang with Dan Cummins to talk about his podcast "Timesuck", Dan moving to Idaho, lowest moments as a comic, and being a father.

 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. To get $30 off your first order with free shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

Laughable is the best rated podcast App in the world. Laughable is a great way to find new comedians and podcasts you love. Just search for "laughable" in the App Store and download today!
